name: Institute of Air Quality Management
membership: Through the IES, IAQM is a partner of the European Federation of Associations of Environmental Professionals (EFFAP)
goal: The IAQM represents professionals working in the field of outdoor and indoor air quality.  It seeks to maintain, promote or enhance the highest standards of working practices for its members.
euInitiatives: Air quality policies and legislation, plus related topics, such as vehicle emissions legislation
